verses.verse: Now the Philistines<WH6430> fought<WH3898> against<WH5921> Israel;<WH3478> and the men<WH376> of Israel<WH3478> fled<WH5127> from before<WH6440> the Philistines,<WH6430> and fell<WH5307> down slain<WH2491> in mount<WH2022> Gilboa.<WH1533>

And the Philistines<WH6430> followed<WH1692> hard<WH5221> after<WH310> Saul,<WH7586> and after<WH310> his sons;<WH1121> and the Philistines<WH6430> slew<WH5221> Jonathan,<WH3129> and Abinadab,<WH41> and Malchishua,<WH4444> the sons<WH1121> of Saul.<WH7586>
And the battle<WH4421> went sore<WH3513> against<WH5921> Saul,<WH7586> and the archers<WH3384> <WH7198> hit<WH4672> him, and he was wounded<WH2342> of the archers.<WH3384>

Then said<WH559> Saul<WH7586> to his armor bearer,<WH5375> <WH3627> Draw<WH8025> your sword,<WH2719> and thrust<WH1856> me through therewith; lest<WH6435> these<WH428> uncircumcised<WH6189> come<WH935> and abuse<WH5953> me. But his armor bearer<WH5375> <WH3627> would<WH14> not; for he was sore<WH3966> afraid.<WH3372> So Saul<WH7586> took<WH3947> a sword,<WH2719> and fell<WH5307> on it.
And when his armor bearer<WH5375> <WH3627> saw<WH7200> that Saul<WH7586> was dead,<WH4191> he fell<WH5307> likewise<WH1571> on<WH5921> the sword,<WH2719> and died.<WH4191>
So Saul<WH7586> died,<WH4191> and his three<WH7969> sons,<WH1121> and all<WH3605> his house<WH1004> died<WH4191> together.<WH3162>

And when all<WH3605> the men<WH376> of Israel<WH3478> that were in the valley<WH6010> saw<WH7200> that they fled,<WH5127> and that Saul<WH7586> and his sons<WH1121> were dead,<WH4191> then they forsook<WH5800> their cities,<WH5892> and fled:<WH5127> and the Philistines<WH6430> came<WH935> and dwelled<WH3427> in them.

And it came<WH1961> to pass on the morrow,<WH4283> when the Philistines<WH6430> came<WH935> to strip<WH6584> the slain,<WH2491> that they found<WH4672> Saul<WH7586> and his sons<WH1121> fallen<WH5307> in mount<WH2022> Gilboa.<WH1533>

And when they had stripped<WH6584> him, they took<WH5375> his head,<WH7218> and his armor,<WH3627> and sent<WH7971> into the land<WH776> of the Philistines<WH6430> round<WH5439> about, to carry<WH1319> tidings<WH1319> to their idols,<WH6091> and to the people.<WH5971>
And they put<WH7760> his armor<WH3627> in the house<WH1004> of their gods,<WH430> and fastened<WH8628> his head<WH1538> in the temple<WH1004> of Dagon.<WH1712>
And when all<WH3605> Jabeshgilead<WH3003> <WH1568> heard<WH8085> all<WH3605> that the Philistines<WH6430> had done<WH6213> to Saul,<WH7586>

They arose,<WH6965> all<WH3605> the valiant<WH2428> men,<WH376> and took<WH5375> away the body<WH1480> of Saul,<WH7586> and the bodies<WH1480> of his sons,<WH1121> and brought<WH935> them to Jabesh,<WH3003> and buried<WH6912> their bones<WH6106> under<WH8478> the oak<WH424> in Jabesh,<WH3003> and fasted<WH6684> seven<WH7651> days.<WH3117>

So Saul<WH7586> died<WH4191> for his transgression<WH4604> which<WH834> he committed<WH4603> against the LORD,<WH3068> even against<WH5921> the word<WH1697> of the LORD,<WH3068> which<WH834> he kept<WH8104> not, and also<WH1571> for asking<WH7592> counsel of one that had a familiar spirit,<WH178> to inquire<WH1875> of it;
And inquired<WH1875> not of the LORD:<WH3068> therefore he slew<WH4191> him, and turned<WH5437> the kingdom<WH4410> to David<WH1732> the son<WH1121> of Jesse.<WH3448>
